member.name: T:AkbarAmd.SharedKernel.Domain.Enumeration
member.summary: Base class for rich enumerations (a.k.a smart enums) with full enterprise features. Supports equality, comparison, parsing, serialization, metadata, and ORM/ODM compatibility. Designed to be thread-safe and highly performant.
member.remarks: This enumeration class provides type-safe alternatives to traditional enums with additional features: - Rich domain modeling with names, ids, and descriptions - Thread-safe caching for performance - Type-safe parsing and validation - Implicit conversions to int and string - Full equality and comparison support - JSON serialization compatibility
